page.title: 03WHERE I LIVE ( continued )
page.content: and I am in the fourth class.On Saturdays we do shows work and exam work. I have passed 8 exams. I like going dancing best. On Sundsys I go to St Davids Church.We go shoping in Wigan.On the bus it only takes about ten minutes.Sometimes me and my mum go with my friend and her mum from up the street.We have quite a big house.My mum my dad and me live in our house.We have two fish.Next year Iam going to Aspull High School.Now I am ten years old.I have always lived in Aspull and Iwouldnt like to move away.There are a lot of pubs in Aspull there is the Moor Gate the Running Horses and the New Inn.
